data.text:
Alastair Reynolds

Alastair Reynolds has written at least 136 books. Their most popular book is Revelation Space with 302 saves with an average rating of 3.84 ‚≠ê.

They are best known for writing in the genres Science fiction, Fantasy, and Space .

Adventurous, mysterious, and challenging are their most common moods.
